title: Fomu
subtitle: Session 2
description:
Fomu, the FPGA in your USB Port

Come get an FPGA dev board in your USB port and start hacking!
Get toolchain setup and you can get free hardware!

''(This is one of many cool things happening throughout 36C3 in the huge '''[[Assembly:Hardware Hacking Area|Hardware Hacking Area!]]''')''

This workshop will be given multiple times (all sessions are identical). The workshop is self guided with helpers for when you get stuck. See https://workshop.fomu.im

Getting the toolchain set up and working will earn you a free Fomu from [[User:Mithro|Tim 'mithro' Ansell]].
